attributes.action: Stop sladburys lane 132 house planning from draining into pickers ditch
attributes.additional_details: The road already has flooding every time it rains the pickers ditch already overflows and more water being put into this ditch will have a greater impact on local residents
attributes.background: To stop the drainage of 132 houses being built in sladburys lane holland on sea being put into a water course that already floods (being pickers ditch) with is already in a flood zone 3 people's home are at risk of more flooding

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for the local planning authority.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
